subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Maharaja Jai Singh II?
explanation_en: The Mehrangarh Fort, built by Maharaja Jai Singh II, is a famous example of Rajasthani architecture.

explanation_hi.question_en: In which year was the construction of Meerpur Fort started?
explanation_hi.explanation_en: The construction of Meerpur Fort began in the year 142 BC. This fort is known for its unique design and historical significance.
explanation_hi.explanation_hi: किरांका व्यांका व्यांका व्यांका व्यांका व्यांका व्यांका
explanation_hi.question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan before Mewar?
explanation_hi.explanation_en: Udaipur was the capital of Rajasthan before Mewar.
